titleStmt.title: Markup Language for events and temporal expressions in natural language

info.p: TimeML is a markup language for events and temporal expressions in natural language. It defines tags, which are usable for interpretation of temporal expressions, temporal annotation of events, and arrangement of events to others through a temporal anchorage.

titleStmt.title: TimeML: A Formal Specification Language for Events and Temporal Expressions
TimeML: A Formal Specification Language for Events and Temporal Expressions
A Formal Specification Language for Events and Temporal Expressions

info.p: In 2002 the TimeML was submitted as Working Draft to ISO and in 2009 it was approved as an international standard.
